title: Our Story To Give You Company
subTitle: About Us
ourDesc1: We EduCare, the highlighted platform to learn specially the basic language from all over the world. We have create a ammicable platform for every aspect of people from different corner of the world.
ourDesc2: We have most skilled tutor pannel to structure the total course, sothat anyone from beginner level will be able to learn upto skilled level. From the teachers, to the assistants, to the students, there is such a family atmosphere that is perfect for nurturing academic ability.
